name: The Last Ship (GoonSquad)
description:
As the last ship of your clan, you must defend your home from oncoming invaders. 

Play as a single viking longboat and defend against waves of enemies. As you play you will gain pretty pennies and use that loot to upgrade your ship to defend against more invaders  

Game Created by Orion Mendes Music by Pawl.D Beats-https://soundcloud.com/user-884597855 aided by  RedUndercover

Non-made Assets Used

Water effect -https://github.com/codewithkyle/Unity-Tutorials/tree/master/low-poly-water

Bow Sound Effect-http://soundbible.com/1780-Bow-Fire-Arrow.html

shop sound effect- https://www.soundboard.com/sb/sound/962818

music-https://soundcloud.com/user-884597855

Produced by-Goon Squad inc
